i.name: Bravado
i.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

q.name: Starlight's Touch
q.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

w.name: Bastion
w.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

e.name: Dazzle
e.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

r.name: Cosmic Radiance
r.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

i1.blurb: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an ability, '''Taric's''' next two [[basic attack]]s within 4 seconds gain {{sti|as|{{as|100% '''total''' attack speed}}}}, each dealing {{pp|25 to 93}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' armor)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} and reducing the {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} of his basic abilities by {{tt|1 second|Affected by cooldown reduction.}}.
i1.name: Bravado
notes: * ''Bravado'' will not be triggered upon using [[item]] actives and [[summoner spell]]s.
* The attacks will apply [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Bravado's'' bonus damage.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Bravado's'' relationship with {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parry}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|block}}, and {{tip|blind}}.
** ''Bravado''-empowered attacks will not apply the bonus damage against structures but will reduce the cooldown of ''Taric's'' basic abilities.

riot.name: Bravado
riot.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

riot.name: Starlight's Touch
riot.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
riot.tooltip:
Spends all charges to heal nearby allied champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of maximum Health) per charge, up to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) at maximum charges.
Maximum charges: {{ e6 }}

Bravado-empowered attacks grant 1 charge of Starlight's Touch.

q1.blurb: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' stores a charge of ''Starlight's Touch'' periodically, up to a maximum at once. {{ai|Bravado|Taric}} empowered attacks grant one charge.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|heals}} himself and all nearby allied champions for 30 {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 1% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} per stored charge at the time of cast, up to a maximum of 150 {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} at 5 charges.
q1.name: Starlight's Touch

riot.name: Bastion
riot.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
riot.tooltip:
Taric's spells will also cast from a nearby ally protected by Bastion.

Passive: Bastion increases Armor by {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Blesses an ally with Bastion and shields them for {{ e2 }}% of their maximum Health for {{ e3 }} seconds. Bastion lasts on the target until a new one is chosen.

w1.blurb: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and links to his ally. While linked, the {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and '''Taric's''' abilities are replicated on the ally, though the effects do not stack.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|shields}} himself and the target allied champion for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, blessing them with the ''Bastion'' link.
'''Taric''' can self-cast ''Bastion'' to shield himself, or to the nearest unlinked ally in range. Only one champion can be marked at a time, and selecting a new ally clears the previous mark.
w1.name: Bastion
notes: * Linked allies will keep continuing {{ai|Bastion}}, {{ai|Dazzle}}, and {{ai|Cosmic Radiance}} even if '''Taric''' is not in {{tt|range|by death or 1300 units}}.

riot.name: Dazzle
riot.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
riot.tooltip: Readies a beam of starlight that, after {{ e3 }} second, deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> <scaleArmor>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleArmor> magic damage and stuns enemies for {{ e2 }} second(s).

e1.blurb: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' projects a beam of starlight towards the target location, erupting after a 1 second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.name: Dazzle
notes: * Casting ''Bastion'' will not interrupt Taric's orders.
* ''Dazzle'' will aim toward Taric's cursor on-cast when firing from both his and his {{ai|Bastion 2|Taric|Bastion's}} positions.

riot.name: Cosmic Radiance
riot.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
riot.tooltip: After a {{ initialdelay }} second delay, pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions, making them invulnerable for {{ invulnduration }} seconds.

r1.blurb: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|2.5}}-second delay, cosmic energy descends upon '''Taric''' and all nearby allied champions, rendering them {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
r1.name: Cosmic Radiance
notes: * All affected units can still be affected with {{tip|crowd control}}.
